CSISTEMA_FIELD6:
**{{prefix}}prefix**
‚ùØ Changes the server prefix.
**{{prefix}}disablecmd**
‚ùØ Disable a command.
**{{prefix}}language**
‚ùØ Change Hope's language.
**{{prefix}}anti-pollution <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enable or disable the anti-pollution mode.

<:Informao:823004619805294643> INFO: **Hope DELETES *ALMOST* ALL COMMANDS AFTER A __PERIOD OF TIME__ TO KEEP THE CHAT CLEAN AND UNPOLLUTED. THE `ANTI-POLLUTION` MODE IS A SIMILAR, BUT OPTIONAL, FUNCTION TO DELETE THE TYPED COMMAND BY THE USER.**
CTICKET_FIELD4:
**{{prefix}}setticket <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enable or disable the ticket addon.
**{{prefix}}ticket-setup category <category ID>**
‚ùØ Configures the category to receive open tickets.
**{{prefix}}ticket-setup role <role ID>**
‚ùØ Configures the support role to get access to open tickets.
**{{prefix}}ticket-setup reason <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enable or disable the requirement for a reason to open a Ticket.
**{{prefix}}ticket-setup close <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enable or disable the permission for the ticket author to close the ticket.
**{{prefix}}ticket-setup log <channelID>**
‚ùØ Configure the log channel for the Ticket addon.
**{{prefix}}ticket-setup type <id | count>**
‚ùØ Configure the type of the channel name of a Ticket.
**{{prefix}}ticket-setup ping <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enable or disable ping everyone when a ticket is opened.
**{{prefix}}ticket-setup limit <1 - 5>**
‚ùØ Sets the limit of tickets opened by a single user.
CTICKET_FIELD6:
**{{prefix}}t-setup title <new title>**
‚ùØ Change the title of the embed.
**{{prefix}}t-setup description <new description>**
‚ùØ Change the description of the embed.
**{{prefix}}t-setup color <new color>**
‚ùØ Changes the color of the embed.
**{{prefix}}t-setup footer <new footer>**
‚ùØ Change the embed footer.
**{{prefix}}t-setup thumbnail <url of the new thumbnail>**
‚ùØ Change the embed thumbnail.
CTICKET_FIELD8:
**{{prefix}}t-setup reaction title <new title>**
‚ùØ Change the title of the embed.
**{{prefix}}t-setup reaction description <new description>**
‚ùØ Change the description of the embed.
**{{prefix}}t-setup reaction color <new color>**
‚ùØ Changes the color of the embed.
**{{prefix}}t-setup reaction footer <new footer>**
‚ùØ Change the embed footer.
**{{prefix}}t-setup reaction thumbnail <url of the new thumbnail>**
‚ùØ Change the embed thumbnail.
**{{prefix}}t-setup reaction emoji <new emoji>**
‚ùØ Change the emoji to react to embed.
CMOD_FIELD6: If set, the bot commands only worked on the given channel.
CMOD_FIELD11:
**{{prefix}}logs <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the Logs addon.
**{{prefix}}logs channel <channel ID>**
‚ùØ Configures the channel to receive event logs.
(To find out which events are available use **{{prefix}}logs list**)
**{{prefix}}logs <add | remove> <EVENT>**
‚ùØ Adds or removes an event from the logs.
**{{prefix}}mod-commands**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the addon to limit the use of commands.
**{{prefix}}mod-channel**
‚ùØ Sets the allowed channel for using Hope's commands.
**{{prefix}}moderation**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the Moderation addon.
**{{prefix}}mod-roles**
‚ùØ Configures the role of moderation.
**{{prefix}}mod-mutedrole**
‚ùØ Sets up the punishment post for muted users.
CLVL_FIELD9:
**{{prefix}}level**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the Level addon.
**{{prefix}}leveloption**
‚ùØ Sets the Addon operation mode.
(Option: `0` = don't warn
Option: `1` = respond to the user when leveling up
Option: `2` = sends the level-up message to a selected channel.
**{{prefix}}levelchannel**
‚ùØ Configures the channel to send a message when advancing levels.
**{{prefix}}levelmsg**
‚ùØ Edits the message sent when advancing levels.
**{{prefix}}level-ignorerole**
‚ùØ Sets the role that will be ignored by the Level addon.
**{{prefix}}level-ignorechannel**
‚ùØ Sets the channel that will be ignored by the Level addon.
**{{prefix}}level-multiplyxp**
‚ùØ Sets the experience multiplier of the Level addon.
**{{prefix}}level-giverole**
‚ùØ Defines the reward role when levelling up. (In tests)
CBV_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Message Addon when Entering server by channel
CBV_FIELD5:
**{{prefix}}wc-addon**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the Welcome message addon.
**{{prefix}}wc-channel**
‚ùØ Configures the welcome message addon channel.
**{{prefix}}wc-message**
‚ùØ Configures the message sent to the user on the channel when joining the server.
**{{prefix}}wc-private**
‚ùØ Choose whether the user recieves the message or the welcome channel

`EMBED SETTINGS`
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed author <new title>** - to change the author of the ticket embed.
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed title <new title>** - to change the title of the ticket embed.
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed description <new description>** - to change the embed description of the Ticket.
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed color <new color>** - to change the embed color of the ticket.
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed footer <new footer>** - to change the footer of the Ticket embed.
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed thumbnail <url of the new thumbnail>** - to change the thumbnail of the Ticket embed.

Use `{prefix}}simjoin` for a simulation.
CBV_FIELD12:
**{{prefix}}wc-leave**
‚ùØ Enable or disable the message addon when a user logs out from the server.
**{{prefix}}wc-leavemsg**
‚ùØ Sets up the message to be sent on the channel to a user leaving the server.
**{{prefix}}wc-leavechannel**
‚ùØ Configures the out message addon channel.
**{{prefix}}wc-leaveprivate**
‚ùØ Choose whether the user recieves the message or the welcome channel

`EMBED SETTINGS`
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed leave author <new title>** - to change the author of the ticket embed.
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed leave title <new title>** - to change the title of the ticket embed.
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed leave description <new description>** - to change the embed description of the Ticket.
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed leave color <new color>** - to change the embed color of the ticket.
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed leave footer <new footer>** - to change the footer of the Ticket embed.
**`{{prefix}}`wc-embed leave thumbnail <url of the new thumbnail>** - to change the thumbnail of the Ticket embed.

Use `{prefix}}simleave` for a simulation.
CMUSICA_FIELD5:
**{{prefix}}ad-music**
‚ùØ Turn the HopeDJ addon on or off.
**{{prefix}}musicdj**
‚ùØ Whether or not you want a DJ role, only users with this role will be able to use the music addon.
**{{prefix}}music-roledj**
‚ùØ Set the dj role.
CAA_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Addon of Anime Self-Posting when your episodes air.
CAA_FIELD4:
**{{prefix}}sugest√£o**
‚ùØ Ative ou desative o addon de Sugest√£o.
**{{prefix}}setar-sugest√µes**
‚ùØ Define o canal para receber sugest√µes.
CSU_FIELD3:
**{{prefix}}set-suggestions**
‚ùØ Disables Addon and reset the channel to Default.
**{{prefix}}set-suggestions <channelID>**
‚ùØ Sets the channel to receive suggestions.
**{{prefix}}suggestions <suggestion id> <WAITING | APPROVED | DENIED> [comment]**
‚ùØ Changes the status of a suggestion.
CAC_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Auto-Posting Addon for updated information on covid-19 every 1 hour.
CAC_FIELD4:
**{{prefix}}auto-covid**
‚ùØ Enables addon on the channel that uses the command.
[**`Notice: The Addon is updated every 1 hour. This time is global for all servers! Don't panic, within 1 hour the first message will be sent.`**]
**{{prefix}}auto-covid disable**
‚ùØ Disables Addon.
VEF_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Verification Addon protects your server against RAIDs.
VEF_FIELD6:
**{{prefix}}vf-channel**
‚ùØ Defines the verification channel.
**{{prefix}}vf-role**
‚ùØ Defines the role that the user will receive when verified.
**{{prefix}}vf-option**
‚ùØ Set the verification level.
(0 = Disabled | 1 = Captcha verification | 2 = Message verification | 3 = Button verification)
AR_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Auto Responses addon to create custom dialogues.
AR_FIELD2:
**{{prefix}}autoresponse**
‚ùØ Create a auto Response which gets triggered without prefix!
**{{prefix}}autoresponselist**
‚ùØ Gives a list of automatic responses on a server.
**{{prefix}}deleteautoresponse**
‚ùØ Deletes an auto-response.

`Variables available:``
**{user}** = User
**{user_tag}** = User Tag
**{user_name}** = Username
**{user_ID}** = User ID
**{guild_name}** = Server Name
**{guild_ID}** = Server ID
**{memberCount}** = Number of users on the server
**{size}** = Number of users on the server
**{guild}** = Server Name
**{member_createdAtAgo}** = Date
**{member_createdAt}** = Date
STICKY_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Sticky addon to keep a message always as the first one in a channel.
STICKY_FIELD9:
**{{prefix}}sticky enable**
‚ùØ Activate the Sticky addon!
**{{prefix}}sticky disable**
‚ùØ Disables the Sticky addon.
**{{prefix}}sticky channel <channel ID>**
‚ùØ Configures the Sticky addon channel.
**{{prefix}}sticky set title <new title>**
‚ùØ Sets the title of the Sticky addon message.
**{{prefix}}sticky set description <new description>**
‚ùØ Set the message description of the Sticky addon.
**{{prefix}}sticky set <new color in HEX>**
‚ùØ Sets the color of the message sent in the Sticky addon.
**{{prefix}}sticky set footer <new footer message>**
‚ùØ Configures the footer message sent in the Sticky addon.
REP_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Addon of Reputations integrated into the profile and with ranking.
NIVER_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Server Anniversary Addon integrated into the profile.
NIVER_FIELD4:
**{{prefix}}birthdays <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the addon.
**{{prefix}}birthdays channel <channel id/mention>**
‚ùØ Sets the channel to send notifications of the day's birthdays.
**{{prefix}}setbirthday <DD-MM>**
‚ùØ Sets the date of your birthday.
TWITCH_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Addon of announcements of lives streams.
TWITCH_FIELD4:
**{{prefix}}auto-twitch add <streamer name> <channel to post>**
‚ùØ Add a streamer.
**{{prefix}}auto-twitch remove <streamer name>**
‚ùØ Remove a streamer.
**{{prefix}}auto-twitch set msg <streamer name> <custom message | disable >**
‚ùØ Sets the Streamer's custom message.
**{{prefix}}auto-twitch set discord <streamer name> <discord link | disable >**
‚ùØ Sets the invitation link of the Streamer's Discord server.
**{{prefix}}auto-twitch set role <streamer name> <role | disable >**
‚ùØ Sets the notification role of the Streamer.

`Variables available:`
**{everyone}** = mention `@everyone`
**{here}** = mention `@here`
**{streamer}** = Streamer Name
**{link}** = Stream link.
**{title}** = Stream Title.
**{viewer}** = Number of viewers in the Stream.
YOUTUBE_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Addon of announcements of new videos from a youtube channel.
YOUTUBE_FIELD4:
**{{prefix}}auto-youtube <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the addon.
**{{prefix}}auto-youtube channel <channel id>**
‚ùØ Sets the channel to send notifications of new videos.
**{{prefix}}auto-youtube <add | remove> <youtube channel id>**
‚ùØ Add or remove a youtube channel.
**{{prefix}}auto-youtube message**
‚ùØ Customize the message sent when a new video is published.

`Variables available:`
**{everyone}** = mention `@everyone`
**{here}** = mention `@here`
**{author}** = Channel Name
**{url}** = Video link.
**{title}** = Video Title.
REDDIT_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Addon of announcements of new posts in a subreddit.
REDDIT_FIELD4:
**{{prefix}}auto-reddit <add> <subreddit> <id channel/mention>**
‚ùØ Enables and adds a subrredit.
**{{prefix}}auto-reddit disable <channel id/mention>**
‚ùØ Disables and removes a channel from the addon.
**{{prefix}}auto-reddit remove <subreddit> <id channel/mention>**
‚ùØ Removes a subreddit from a channel.
ANIMES_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Announcement addon for when an anime goes live.
ANIMES_FIELD4:
**{{prefix}}aa-add <Anilist/Mal link>**
‚ùØ Adds a new anime to watch for new episodes of. You may provide an <:anilist:829424569869795328>AniList entry link or a <:MyAnimeList:827773575112425472>MyAnimeList link. Supports multiple ids/links.
**{{prefix}}aa-remove <Anilist/Mal link>**
‚ùØ Removes a watched anime from your list.
**{{prefix}}aa-channel <Channel ID/Mention>**
‚ùØ Where will i post the announcement for recently aired anime?
**{{prefix}}aa-list**
‚ùØ View list of anime this server is subscribed to.
**{{prefix}}aa-disable**
‚ùØ Disable the Auto-Animes addon for this server.

**TO SEE THE CURRENT LIST OF AVAILABLE ANIMES THAT ARE CURRENTLY IN PRODUCTION, VISIT [THIS LINK](https://anilist.co/search/anime?year=2021&airing%20status=RELEASING).**
MENSAGEM_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> This addon will send a message every X messages on a specific channel.
MENSAGEM_FIELD4:
**{{prefix}}auto-message <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the addon.
**{{prefix}}auto-message channel <channel id>**
‚ùØ Sets the addon channel.
**{{prefix}}auto-message counter <1-1000>**
‚ùØ Sets the number of the message counter.
**{{prefix}}auto-message message <message>**
‚ùØ Sets the addon message sent.**
NICK_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> This addon will send a message every X messages on a specific channel.
NICK_FIELD4:
**{{prefix}}auto-nick <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the addon.
**{{prefix}}auto-nick nick <pre-nick>**
‚ùØ Set the Pre-Nick of the addon.
RR_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Addon to add roles by reactions on your server.
RR_FIELD9:
**{{prefix}}rr-add**
‚ùØ Create a Reaction Role on an existing message.
**{{prefix}}rr-custom**
‚ùØ Create a Custom Reaction Role.
**{{prefix}}rr-em** <ChannelID> <messageID> <roleID> <emojiID> <option>
‚ùØ Add a Reaction Role on an existing message.
**{{prefix}}rr-remove <RR messageLink>**
‚ùØ Remove a Reaction Role.
**{{prefix}}rr-removeall**
‚ùØ Remove all Reaction Roles from server.
**{{prefix}}rr-set <RR messageID> title <new title>**
‚ùØ Sets the message title of the addon.
**{{prefix}}rr-set <RR messageID> description <new description>**
‚ùØ Set the message description of the addon.
**{{prefix}}rr-set <RR messageID> <new color in HEX>**
‚ùØ Sets the color of the message sent in the addon.
**{{prefix}}rr-set <RR messageID> footer <new message>**
‚ùØ Configures the footer message sent in the addon.
**{{prefix}}rr-set <RR messageID> thumbnail <link to the new thumbnail>.**
‚ùØ Configures the Thumbnail of the addon.
APP_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Addon to create application forms on your server.
APP_FIELD5:
**{{prefix}}apply**
‚ùØ Apply in the current servers, or answer a few questions.
**{{prefix}}applylog <enable #channel> | <disable>**
‚ùØ Set's the guild's apply Logs.
**{{prefix}}approveapp <user> <app ID> <reason>**
‚ùØ Approve an application in the guild.
**{{prefix}}declineapp <user> <app ID> <reason>**
‚ùØ Decline an application in the guild.
**{{prefix}}questions**
‚ùØ Displays all the form questions in the server.
**{{prefix}}addquestion <question>**
‚ùØ Add questions to the list and when you apply they will be there.
**{{prefix}}remquestion <number>**
‚ùØ Removes a question off the list.
**{{prefix}}review**
‚ùØ Approve an application in the guild.
STATS_FIELD: <:Informao:823004619805294643> Log and display statistics on your server.
STATS_FIELD15:
**{{prefix}}server-stats <enable | disable>**
‚ùØ Enables or disables the addon.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add online**
‚ùØ Add online user statistics.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add dnd**
‚ùØ Add dnd user statistics.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add idle**
‚ùØ Add idle user statistics.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add offline**
‚ùØ Add offline user statistics.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add allstatus**
‚ùØ Add online/dnd/idle user statistics.
STATS_FIELD17:
‚ùØ Add subscriber statistics to a youtube channel.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add youtube-views**
‚ùØ Add view statistics of a youtube channel.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add youtube-videos**
‚ùØ Add video statistics from a youtube channel.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add twitch-followers <TwitchChannel>**
‚ùØ Add followers statistics of a user on Twitch.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add joins-today**
‚ùØ Adds statistics of daily joins of the server.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add joins-weekly**
‚ùØ Adds statistics of weekly joins of the server.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add leaves-today**
‚ùØ Adds statistics of daily server leaves.
**{{prefix}}server-stats add leaves-weekly**
‚ùØ Adds statistics of weekly server leaves.
